name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Master - Chat Everywhere by Shortcuts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With your customized templates, Make ChatGPT to start dynamic conversations on any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With ChatGPT Master, you can easily initiate a conversation by simply selecting any text and using the right-click menu to start a ChatGPT conversation.

1. Instant Chatting: Right-Click to Start a Conversation Anywhere
2. Three Preset Templates: Simplify Your Chatting Experience
3. Customizable Templates: Tailor ChatGPT to Your Needs, Enjoy Template Settings for Free

Your Feedback is Welcome: Help us Make ChatGPT Master the Best ChatGPT Extension Out There!
